infos.value: ...What do you want?
Where have you been?
I need not answer to the likes of you.
Guilt has a way of snatching one's tongue away... Or am I wrong?
If you want to know so badly, then I'll tell you.
I've just returned from killing Oelde.
...Prove it.
If you do not wish to believe it, don't.
...I'll just have to make a report to Lord Sadali based on what you've told me, then.
...It's Vistralle.
According to Sterne, Oelde has been killed.
...Yes.
No, but I will get right on it...
As you wish, my lord.
Wait.
You say you killed Oelde, but where is the proof?
Proof...?
Don't feign ignorance. Leonis's ancient relic. Where is it?
Oh, you mean the ring... I got rid of it.
Enough of this! As if you would discard an ancient relicâ€”!
You were hoping to steal it from me and gain favor with Sadali... Or am I wrong?
Just as I thought. How pathetic.
Hand it over. And if you refuse...
You truly believe you could best me?
As if I would take you on myself... Come on out!
We've been had. Dispose of this traitor.
